title: Touch Of My Hand
body:
Another day without a lover the more I come to understand the touch of my hand.

Touch Of My Hand

I’m not ashamed of the things that I dreamI find myself flirting with the verge of obsceneInto the unknown, I will be boldI’m going to places I can be out of control“Loki?” You whisper softly,…

Read more…

blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

summary: I love it when you hurt me
title: I love it when you hurt me
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OPaFz9

by EmbraceTheDark

Natasha is a little crazy, but mostly masochistic, Clint feels a little uncomfortable about it.

Not that he wouldn’t indulge his girlfriend anyway.

Words: 729, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel)

title: Locked Out Of Valhalla
body:
You find out that Loki has virtually no sexual experience, and you decide to help him out.

Locked Out Of Valhalla

When you were first assigned to care for Loki’s chambers, you expected it to be as messy and visited as Fandral’s, minus the annoying bragging and showing-off-ness (Loki has way more class). But…

Read more…

blog.name: celadons-penultimate
blog.title: Freak? I prefer Superhuman-American.
blog.description: You might have noticed, my feed is full of all sorts of weirdness. But I don't just stick to superheroes. I love superhumans, superpowers and the supernatural. Superheroes, supervillains, mythology, legend and folklore, sci-fi, fantasy, the strange, the metaphysical, you name it.

blog.title: Directing Science Disneyland
blog.description: You have reached the tumblr of Tony Stark. After making Banner get a blog here I finally gave in and made a public one myself. Ask me things or just enjoy the show, choice is yours. I check the tag "sarcastictonystark" and you can @tag me Not currently accepting M!As Currently accepting compliments None of the images are mine, just the words between them. summary: Brie Larson, Captain Marvel, habría firmado por 7 películas, pero ella lo desmiente.
title: Brie Larson, Captain Marvel, habría firmado por 7 películas, pero ella lo desmiente.
body:
Brie Larson, Captain Marvel, habría firmado por 7 películas, pero ella lo desmiente.

Que tal a toda la banda de MultiAnime!

El día de hoy, trascendió que la actriz Brie Larson, quien encarga a la poderosa Capitana Marvel, habría firmado por 7 películas con la casa productora, haciendo que los fans se hayan emocionado bastante, sin embargo, hace algunas horas, la actriz, mediante su cuenta de Twitter indicó que no era cierto.

En fin, yo pienso que al menos en dos películas está…

View On WordPress

blog.description: Established in 2008, POPBEE is a Hong Kong based online editorial focused on broadcasting the most up to date fashion, beauty and shopping news to its readers. POPBEE has evolved into a growing online fashion community and covers all aspects of fashion...

summary: Iron Man 新戰衣登場！除了帥氣，能力看起來也增強了不少呢！
title: Iron Man 新戰衣登場！除了帥氣，能力看起來也增強了不少呢！
body:
繼 Mark Ruffalo 在節目劇透，意外爆出《Avengers 4》的正式電影標題，以及昨天指《Avengers: Infinity War》跟《Avengers 4》兩部電影的時間設定其實相距整整五年後，今日又再有關於《Avengers 4》的消息傳出，而且更是跟最得觀眾歡心的 Iron Man 戰衣有關呢！看來 Marvel 的確準備要為電影造勢了！

從這些由 Marvel Studios 外傳出來的照片中，我們可以看到 Iron Man 戰衣上面罩和手臂有著跟以往不同的改動，另外武器也配置也有更改，同時更有消息指今次這件新戰衣將會有著全新的功能。雖然詳細的資料仍未公佈，但相信是因著在《Avengers 4》中，Iron Man 要跟 Thanos 來一場激戰，因此在裝備上也要進行提升才有機會扭轉局勢。你又比較喜歡哪一件戰衣呢？

延伸閱讀：
跟初代 Avengers 說再見！Marvel 總裁：「最好的故事都要有明確的終結！」
兩個重要角色要回歸《Avengers 4》，其中一個更會跟 Thanos 聯手滅世？
又爆出讓粉絲驚訝的消息，《Avengers 4》的背景竟設定於這麼多年後發生…
輪到 Marvel 總裁劇透，原來《蟻俠》早已藏著打敗 Thanos 的彩蛋！

Follow us on Facebook: fb.com/POPBEE
Follow us on Instagram: Instagram.com/POPBEE
